sentence.Network_en: Namibia, formerly known as South West Africa
sentence.Network_cn: 纳米比亚，旧称西南非洲

sentence.Network_en: This area was formerly within the sphere of influence of the US.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一地区先前属于美国的势力范围。

sentence.Network_en: We now enjoy these comforts of which formerly we had only heard.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们现在享受到了过去只是听说过的那些舒适条件.

entry.def: If something happened or was true formerly, it happened or was true in the past.

example.ex: He had formerly been in the Navy.

auth_sentence.content: Luxembourg's prosperity was formerly based on steel manufacturing.

sentences.en: This boat was formerly used on the rivers of China.
sentences.cn: 这船从前航行在中国内河里。
